DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect 12 week ' increase daily physical activity versus diet restriction regional fat distribution , insulin sensitivity adipokines include retinol bind protein-4 ( RBP-4 ) , leptin , adiponectin , new marker , adiponectin leptin ratio ( AL ratio ) , type 2 diabetic woman .
